Package Model

Class Coin

java.lang.Object
Model.GameObject
Model.Coin
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Coin extends GameObject
Represents a coin object in the game.
See Also:

      Draws the coin.

      draw in class GameObject

      g - The graphics object to draw on.
      x - The x-coordinate to draw the coin.
      y - The y-coordinate to draw the coin.

    • interact

      public boolean interact(Player player)
      Interacts with the player. If the coin is not collected, it adds the coin's value to the player's balance and marks the coin as collected.
      Specified by:
      interact in class GameObject
      Parameters:
      player - The player object to interact with.
      Returns:
      Always returns false.

    • drawCollected

      public void drawCollected(Graphics g, int objectX, int objectY)
      Draws the collected state of the coin. This method is intended to be overridden by subclasses to draw any additional visual effects when the coin is collected.
      Parameters:
      g - The graphics object to draw on.
      objectX - The x-coordinate of the object.
      objectY - The y-coordinate of the object.
